remarks: If two multipliers are congruent relative to the base point's order, the corresponding multiples are the same.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
statement:
odcl.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
odcl.2 $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
odid.3 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
odid.4 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
odcong $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) ) -> ( ( O ` A ) || ( M - N ) <-> ( M .x. A ) = ( N .x. A ) ) ) $.
